rows.label: tev000995_MSG0001
rows.name: Hello, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000995_MSG0002
rows.name: I've been struggling with something lately.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000995_MSG0003
rows.name:
A number of xenoforms have started coming to hear
my sermons.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000995_MSG0004
rows.name:
Until now, my disciples have tended to come and go,
so I've never had such a large group with whom to
share the wisdom of the Buddha.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000995_MSG0005
rows.name:
And while I'm happy for that, I've noticed the crowd
bursting into laughter at various points.
Various...inappropriate points.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000995_MSG0006
rows.name:
When I use a Zen Buddhist "katsu" to scold them into
a desire for self-improvement, they laugh at that, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000995_MSG0007
rows.name:
In my younger years, I'd have just shooed them away.
But age and experience have made me reluctant to
exclude any from the teachings of the Buddha.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000995_MSG0008
rows.name:
Instead, I've been trying to find a way to get them to
listen more intently to my sermons.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000995_MSG0009
rows.name:
After all, an opportunity to share the teachings of the
Buddha throughout the universe should not be ignored![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000995_MSG0010
rows.name:
With this in mind, I've prepared three sermons which I
believe might have intergalactic appeal. Which of these
do you think I should use?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000995_JNK0010
rows.name: Pizza

rows.label: tev000995_SEL0011
rows.name: An amusing homily about the joys of eating.

rows.label: tev000995_JNK0020
rows.name: Prejudice

rows.label: tev000995_SEL0021
rows.name: A fiery sermon about the dangers of prejudice.

rows.label: tev000995_JNK0030
rows.name: Festivals

rows.label: tev000995_SEL0031
rows.name: A talk about festivals involving offerings of food.

rows.label: tev000995_MSG0011
rows.name: You prefer that one?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000995_MSG0012
rows.name: It's true, the Ma-non are obsessed with pizza.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000995_MSG0013
rows.name:
And the lack of it seems to be a source of great
consternation for them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000995_MSG0014
rows.name:
This despite the fact that they never even knew about
pizza until very recently.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000995_MSG0015
rows.name:
I was hoping to preach about how they should consider
pizza a source of joy, not a necessity which they should
bemoan the absence of.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000995_MSG0016
rows.name:
There are a number of Prone in the audience as well,
but hopefully the general topic of food will hold their
attention.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000995_MSG0017
rows.name: Right then! I suppose I should get started.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000995_MSG0018
rows.name: I trust you'll be in attendance?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000995_MSG0019
rows.name:
I'm glad I sought your advice on this.
Thank you for your counsel.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000995_MSG0020
rows.name:
We'll have to go over additional future sermon topics
when we have more time to talk.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000995_MSG0021
rows.name: You prefer that one? Interesting...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000995_MSG0022
rows.name: Have you heard of cicadas?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000995_MSG0023
rows.name:
They're insects that emerge into the world as mature
adults, then die off within the month.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000995_MSG0024
rows.name:
People often talk about their lives as fleeting things,
but in truth they live underground for many years
before we humans ever notice them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000995_MSG0025
rows.name:
That's an allegory for how people can be deceived by
their perceptions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000995_MSG0026
rows.name: And, I think, a very relevant example for New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000995_MSG0027
rows.name:
I hope to teach both humans and xenoforms alike how
to understand each other without being led astray by
their prejudices.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000995_MSG0028
rows.name: Right then! I suppose I should get started.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000995_MSG0029
rows.name: I trust you'll be in attendance?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000995_MSG0030
rows.name:
I'm glad I sought your advice on this.
Thank you for your counsel.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000995_MSG0031
rows.name:
We'll have to go over additional future sermon topics
when we have more time to talk.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000995_MSG0032
rows.name: You prefer that one? Hmm...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000995_MSG0033
rows.name: The idea was to teach them about our Earth customs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000995_MSG0034
rows.name:
I believe that the more the xenos understand about us,
the more cordial our relations will be.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000995_MSG0035
rows.name: However...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000995_MSG0036
rows.name:
I'm a little worried that the Ma-non will misinterpret
the point and think I'm proposing a pizza party.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000995_MSG0037
rows.name: Regardless, if you think it best, I'll get started.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000995_MSG0038
rows.name: I trust that you'll be in attendance?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000995_MSG0039
rows.name: ...As I'd feared, the topic quickly turned to pizza.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000995_MSG0040
rows.name:
The other xenoforms in attendance got swept up in their
excitement, and it appears they've decided to actually
throw a pizza party of their own.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000995_MSG0041
rows.name:
That sort of thing is...not a strong suit of mine,
but as I inspired it, I suppose I'd best attend.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000995_MSG0042
rows.name: With you as my invited guest, of course.[ST:wait ]
